DOC.brief_title: Safety Efficacy Human Insulin Inhalation Powder Patients With Type 1 Diabetes Mellitus .

You inject insulin lispro ( Humalog ) , insulin lispro mixture ( Humalog Mixture ) , regular human insulin mixture ( Humulin mixture ) meal use syringe injection pen , insulin pump .
